body.name: Keurig 3-Month Brewer Maintenance Kit Includes Descaling Solution, Water Filter Cartridges & Rinse Pods, Compatible Classic/1.0 & 2.0 K-Cup Coffee Makers, 7 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 8 hrs 31 mins
features: INCLUDES: 4 Keurig Rinse Pods, 1 Descale Solution, and 2 Water Filter Cartridge Refills
RINSE PODS: reduces flavor carry-over between brews
QUICKEST WAY TO CLEAN YOUR K-Cup pod holder: rinse away residue and oils that can build up in your coffee maker
EASY TO USE: use just like you would a regular K-Cup pod
SAFE AND EFFECTIVE: gentle and odorless formula
DESCALING SOLUTION: use every 3 months to clean and remove mineral deposits that can built up inside your coffee maker
IMPROVE COFFEE TASTE: by removing mineral buildup that can affect the taste of your beverages
SAFE AND GENTLE: safely cleans inside your coffee maker without harming your brewer
WATER FILTER CARTRIDGES: filter chlorine, calcium, and other impurities from your water to enhance beverage taste and quality
EASY TO USE: soak, rinse, insert and place in your brewer - enjoy better tasting beverages in 5 minutes
body.description: Cleaning your coffee maker regularly is an important step to extend the life of your brewer and keep your beverages tasting their best. The 3 Month Brewer Care Kit has everything you need to regularly clean and maintain your brewer for 3 months. The Keurig 3 Month Brewer Care Kit includes 1 bottle of Keurig Descaling Solution, 2 Water Filter Cartridges, and 4 Keurig Rinse Pods. The 3 Month Brewer Care Kit is compatible with all Keurig coffee makers. If you have a Keurig K-Mini or K-Mini Plus brewer, we recommend that you consider our Keurig Cleanse Kit which only includes Keurig Descaling Solution and Keurig Rinse Pods as the K-Mini brewers do not use Water Filter Handles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must-Have Kit for Keeping Your Keurig Brewing Perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Keurig 3-Month Brewer Maintenance Kit for my Keurig coffee maker, and I couldn't be happier with the results. This kit is an absolute must-have for anyone who wants to maintain their Keurig machine in optimal condition and ensure a consistently perfect brew every time.The kit contains everything you need to keep your Keurig running smoothly and extend its lifespan. It includes a bottle of Keurig Descaling Solution, a pack of Keurig Water Filter Cartridges, and a set of cleaning tools. The descaling solution effectively removes any mineral deposits and build-up inside the machine, while the water filter cartridges help maintain pure and fresh-tasting water for brewing. The cleaning tools make it easy to clean hard-to-reach areas, ensuring a thorough cleansing of the brewing system.The instructions provided in the kit are clear and easy to follow, making the maintenance process a breeze. I was pleasantly surprised by how quick and simple it was to descale my Keurig using the included solution. It eliminated the lime scale buildup and restored my machine's performance to like-new condition.Since using the maintenance kit, I have noticed a significant improvement in the taste and quality of my coffee. The water filters effectively remove impurities, resulting in a cleaner and more flavorful cup of coffee. I also appreciate how the kit helps prevent clogs and malfunctions, ensuring a consistently smooth brewing experience.Furthermore, the three-month supply is a great value for the price. It's convenient not having to worry about purchasing individual cleaning and maintenance products separately. This kit provides everything needed to keep my Keurig in top shape for an extended period.In conclusion, the Keurig 3-Month Brewer Maintenance Kit is an excellent investment for any Keurig owner. It simplifies the cleaning and maintenance process, extends the lifespan of the machine, and enhances the overall coffee brewing experience. I highly recommend this kit to all Keurig users who want to enjoy consistently great-tasting coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This kit works well. Make sure to run all 12 rinse cycles when you use the descaling solution. It really does make a difference in your coffee/beverage taste. Well worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn't need it all.
reviews.reviewText: Our Keurig doesn't have to have a filter because we use spring water, and it didn't come with one. So having the filter was a waste for us. We did not know that most Keurigs had replaceable filters. So next time I'll just order the part I need. Also, and this is odd, my fill water light quit working after using the cleaner and running multiple water through.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and Service
reviews.reviewText: A good value for use in your Keurig Coffey machine. The instructions left a bit to be desired (not clear on how to start and end the process for our machine).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keurig 3- Month Brewer Maintenance Kit
reviews.reviewText: The Keurig 3- Month Brewer Maintenance Kit is easy to use. Just read the instructions to find out how to clean the size Keurig you have. I clean my keurig every 3 months to make sure it stays in good working order. I would recommend this product to anyone with a keurig coffee maker.

reviews.reviewText: Didn't notice any improvement in taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as listed
reviews.reviewText: Read all the directions thoroughly and works as it should. Slightly expensive for what it is but the cost of owning a Keurig I guessHad no issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My coffee taste so much better. Great cleaning product for Kerigs.

Machine was leaking and not functioning properly, thought I needed to spend $200+ on a new machine. Decided to try the cleaning kit first and WOW! The gunk that came out was shocking but the machine runs beautifully like brand new. Definitely going to use this more regularly now! Maybe not needing this whole kit every time but for sure the cleaning fluid.
El kit de limpieza es completo y fácil de usar, mejoró el desempeño de mi cafetera
did a great job, easy instructions
I didn't know you needed to clean your Keurigs. Turns out you do. These work as described and expected
